text: The Lockheed MC-130 is a US military cargo aircraft. It is a very specialized variant of the famous C-130 Hercules, used exclusively by U.S. special forces. It can fly on low altitude. MC-130 are only used by US Air Force. The MC-130J, which became operational in 2011, is the new-production variant that is replacing the other special operations MC-130s."First HC/MC-130J Assembled" , AIR FORCE Magazine December 2009. Air Force Association. Retrieved 4 December 2009. As of May 2016, the Air Force has taken delivery of 33 of the planned 37 -J models., p.76 ==References== Category:United States Air Force aircraft MC-130
title: Lockheed MC-130
